Text: The growth in first-half production resulted in an 8% rise in revenue to US$43.3mln and an 27% jump in pre-tax profit to US$10.3mln.
Effect: an 8% rise in revenue to US$43.3mln and an 27% jump in pre-tax profit to US$10.3mln.
Sentence: <e1>The growth in first-half production</e1> resulted in <e2>an 8% rise in revenue to US$43.3mln and an 27% jump in pre-tax profit to US$10.3mln.</e2>
